dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Bar scale on map given in "Statute miles".
Shows topography, drainage, vegetation (including deserts and oases), islands surrounding continent.
2 inset maps: Liberia -- Delta of the Nile.
dct_publisher_sm: entered according to act of Congress in the year 1858 by J. H. Colton & Co. in the Clerks Office of the District Court of the United States for the Southern District of New York,
